sensors

Class SensorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • sensors.SensorHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SensorHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class handles all the sensors and requests updates of each sensor every set period of time
    Since:
    01-04-2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Bezem
